io.github.daveho.funwithsound

Class Tempo

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.daveho.funwithsound.Tempo

  • public class Tempo
extends java.lang.Object
    Tempo determines the absolute tempo (beats per minute) and also, based on the number of beats per measure, helps determine microsecond offsets and durations of events (e.g., Strikes) occuring within a measure.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tempo(int beatsPerMinute, int beatsPerMeasure)
      Constructor.

      Determine the offset in microseconds of the beginning of the specified measure.

      Convert a timestamp or duration in microseconds to a number of beats.
